extension_description.message: Translate selected text on the web page and convert to specified format.

turn_off_description.message: Translate button will popup everytime text is selected

turn_on_description.message: Translate button will not show up when text is selected but you can still translate by clicking the Pro Translate icon in toolbar

auto_switch.message: Automatically switch to the second target language

auto_switch_description.message: When the selected text is the default target language, translate it to second target language

second_target_language_description.message: Select the default second target language

target_format_description.message: Select the default target format, format can be change in translation panel

auto_set_format_description.message: When change format in translation panel, set the selected format to default format

format_and_order_description.message: Format cases that can be change in translation panel and display order

translate_button_on_description.message: Translate button will popup everytime text is selected

translate_button_off_description.message: Translate button will not show up when text is selected but you can still translate by clicking the Pro Translate icon in toolbar
